cnbc.title: Chicago Bears valued at nearly $9 billion in minority stake sale that sets an NFL record: Sources
cnbc.summary: The league's finance committee approved the sale of 2.35% of the Chicago Bears to existing team owners, according to multiple people familiar with the deal.

cnbc.title: 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' return draws 6.26 million viewers, ABC parent Disney says
cnbc.summary: "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" returned to air Tuesday night, generating 6.26 million total viewers despite significant preemptions across 23% of U.S. TV households.

cnbc.title: Trump claims ‘sabotage’ at U.N. from escalator, teleprompter and mic
cnbc.summary: Trump noted that The Times, a British newspaper, reported that U.N. employees "joked about turning off an escalator" before his appearance there.

cnbc.title: Former FBI Director Comey expected to be indicted soon in Virginia federal court: MSNBC
cnbc.summary: James Comey reportedly is being investigated for possibly lying to Congress during testimony in 2020 about whether he authorized a leak of information.

cnbc.title: Day trading is about to get easier for smaller retail investors
cnbc.summary: Regulators are moving to dismantle one of the most controversial barriers for active retail traders — the $25,000 minimum equity rule for pattern day trading.

cnbc.title: Lithium Americas soars 95% as Trump administration seeks equity stake in Canadian miner
cnbc.summary: It is the latest move by the White House to take direct ownership in the U.S. critical mineral supply chain.

cnbc.title: Nexstar evaluating status of 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' for ABC stations after late night show's return
cnbc.summary: Nexstar's broadcast TV stations affiliated with ABC did not air Kimmel's return to late night on Tuesday.

cnbc.title: 1 ICE detainee dead, 2 wounded in Dallas shooting; gunman identified
cnbc.summary: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem said authorities do not know the motive for the shooting, but "we know that our ICE law enforcement is facing unprecedented violence."

cnbc.title: Trump's tennis invite from Rolex echoes Apple, Nvidia playbook for currying favor, Warren says
cnbc.summary: Trump placed a 39% levy on Switzerland's exports, and Warren questioned if Rolex was vying for an exemption from the tariffs.

cnbc.title: New York City mayor candidate Curtis Sliwa says he was offered money to quit race
cnbc.summary: President Trump has suggested that Curtis Sliwa and Mayor Eric Adams drop out as candidates to allow a showdown between Zohran Mamdani and Andrew Cuomo.
